en-US.summary: Get lame lab jokes for fun.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask lab dog for joke
Alexa tell lab dog to tell me joke
en-US.name: Lab Dog
en-US.description:
Lab Related jokes. To start the fun, say "Alexa, launch Lab Dog" or "Alexa, open Lab Dog" to get a Joke".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
